DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to demonstrate the advantages of intraneural injection over extraneural injection in terms of onset and duration on peripheral block. In addition we will evaluate the frequency of possible adverse effects.
DOC.brief_title: Popliteal Sciatic Nerve Block: Intraneural or Extraneural?
